name: Greencrest Capital
tag_list: research, social-media, advisory, secondary-markets, direct-markets, liquidity, shareholder-liquidity-program
overview: GreenCrest Capital is a research and advisory firm that focuses on emerging growth companies before they go public. We offer a subscription based service that gives our customer access to company reports and sector analyses. GreenCrest currently is an exclusive advisor to PE Source, a division of Knight Capital Americas, L.P. and a top platform for institutions seeking to invest in shares of private companies.
